label: uncl4431
comment: Code specifying the means of payment guarantee.

values.label: Factor guarantee
values.comment: Payment of an invoice is made by a factor under the guarantee he issued to seller or to another factor.

values.label: Bank guarantee
values.comment: A bank has agreed to stand as guarantor to ensure that payment is made.

values.label: Public authority guarantee
values.comment: A public authority has agreed to stand as guarantor to ensure that payment is made.

values.label: Third party guarantee
values.comment: The party who has agreed to stand as guarantor to ensure that payment is made is neither the payee nor the payer.

values.label: Standby letter of credit
values.comment: The guarantee of payment is in the form of a standby letter of credit.

values.label: No guarantee
values.comment: No guarantee of payment has been made or is available.

values.label: Goods as security
values.comment: The payer has provided possession of, or title in goods, as security against payment.

values.label: Business as security
values.comment: The payer has provided title in, or a lien over a business whose assets may be sold or sequestered, as security against payment.

values.label: Warrant or similar (warehouse receipts)
values.comment: The payer has provided a warrant or warehouse receipts for goods or property to be held or used as security against payment.

values.label: Mortgage
values.comment: The payer has provided a mortgage as security against payment.

values.label: Insurance certificate
values.comment: A certificate of insurance has been provided as a guarantee of eventual payment.

values.label: Mutually defined
values.comment: A code assigned within a code list to be used on an interim basis and as defined among trading partners until a precise code can be assigned to the code list.
